title: Sunday Divine Liturgy
description: Join us for the celebration of the Divine Liturgy, followed by fellowship and coffee hour.

title: Weekly Bible Study
description: Explore scripture together in a welcoming small group setting. All are welcome.

title: Seattle Greek Festival
description: Our annual celebration of Greek culture featuring authentic food, music, dancing, and tours of our beautiful church.

title: Philoptochos Spring Luncheon
description: Annual fundraising luncheon supporting local charities and community outreach programs.
